channel.title: Patch not starting on power-up
channel.description:
I'm following the instructions here, for uploading a patch to internal flash... https://sebiik.github.io/community.axoloti.com.backup/t/uploading-to-the-axoloti-hardware/60
I can't get the patch to run after powering down and back up. According to the instructions it should start automatically?
In case it was something about my patch (which runs fine in Live mode) I also checked using the tybett demo, and that didn't play either.
Thanks for suggestions!

item.title: Patch not starting on power-up
item.dc:creator: @mattr Matt Rogalsky
item.description:
@mattr wrote:

Thanks for the suggestion. The tybett example starts fine when running from sdcard. My looping file playback patch still isn't working. Want to check it out to see if I'm doing something wrong?

The patch depends on an initial loadbang to start the file player... perhaps I should put a delay on that to make sure it happens after the patch is fully loaded?

Read full topic

item.title: Patch not starting on power-up
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

Try the save as sdcard startup option, this is what I use.
(I'll have to test the flash option, also not sure this work if there is an sdcard loaded , need to check )

Read full topic

item.title: Patch not starting on power-up
item.dc:creator: @mattr Matt Rogalsky
item.description:
@mattr wrote:

I'm following the instructions here, for uploading a patch to internal flash...

Uploading to the Axoloti hardware User Guide
Overview In the main user guide, we mentioned that taking a patch live in the Axoloti UI will upload it to the hardware. The Axoloti UI is where you build your patches, but it is not compulsary for using them. In this post we will be discussing how to use patches when not connected to a computer. Uploading firmware Live When we take a patch 'Live' we are uploading the patch to the Axoloti, and then maintaining a connection with this patch so that the UI can interact with it. e.g. by using tâ€¦

I can't get the patch to run after powering down and back up. According to the instructions it should start automatically?

In case it was something about my patch (which runs fine in Live mode) I also checked using the tybett demo, and that didn't play either.

Thanks for suggestions!

Read full topic
